text: Simen Berntsen (born 2 July 1976) is a retired Norwegian ski jumper. In the World Cup he finished once among the top 10, with a tenth place from Oslo in March 1997. He finished second overall in the Continental Cup in the 1996/97 season. ==External links== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male ski jumpers
title: Simen Berntsen
